author: Y Combinator
description:
YC General Partner David Lieb sits down with Aravind Srinivas, the co-founder and CEO of Perplexity, to discuss his origins in Silicon Valley, what it's like to compete with Google, and what the future of search could look like.

Apply to Y Combinator: https://ycombinator.com/apply

0:00 Intro 
0:51 Aravind’s early days in AI
3:45 What made Aravind start a company
6:35 The first iterations 
14:10 Realizing Perplexity had potential 
19:02 “The user is never wrong.”
22:20 Managing the team
24:53 Brutal honesty brings out the worst bugs
25:33 Avoiding becoming a big slow company
27:37 The future of search
31:11 Perplexity’s advantage against its competitors
34:26 Outro
title: How To Build The Future: Aravind Srinivas
